thread.title: Japan & China say trade war will harm world economy

title: Japan & China say trade war will harm world economy
text:
Japan & China say trade war will harm world economy 6:51pm BST - 01:30 
Japan and China agree that a trade war will have serious consequences for the world economy, Japanese Foreign Minister Taro Kono said after a high-level economic dialogue between the world’s third and second-largest economies. Laura Frykberg reports.   
Japan and China agree that a trade war will have serious consequences for the world economy, Japanese Foreign Minister Taro Kono said after a high-level economic dialogue between the world’s third and second-largest economies. Laura Frykberg reports.  //reut.rs/2qBoQtr
